scripts.start: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=development concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run client" "npm run server:dev"
scripts.deploy: cross-env-shell NODE_ENV=production npm run build:client && npm run copier && npm run server:prod
scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client && npm i
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m default && git push
